impactDescription: I use the optimism network because it has low fees and transactions are faster than those of other competing networks. Being a simple user, I can contribute by staking the tokens, thus increasing the security and liquidity of the chain. My contribution was therefore marginal but I have now adopted optimism as my favorite network
